official-title.#text: To ensure the complete and timely payment of the obligations of the United States Government until May 19, 2013, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives January 23, 2013.

short-title.#text: No Budget, No Pay Act of 2013

header.#text: Holding salaries of members of congress in escrow upon failure to agree to budget resolution

text.#text: The payroll administrator shall provide for the same withholding and remittance with respect to a payment deposited in an escrow account under

header.#text: Withholding and remittance of amounts from payments held in escrow

text.#text: In order to ensure that this section is carried out in a manner that shall not vary the compensation of Senators or Representatives in violation of the twenty-seventh article of amendment to the Constitution of the United States, the payroll administrator of a House of Congress shall release for payments to Members of that House of Congress any amounts remaining in any escrow account under this section on the last day of the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress.

header.#text: Release of amounts at end of the congress

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall provide the payroll administrators of the Houses of Congress with such assistance as may be necessary to enable the payroll administrators to carry out this section.

header.#text: Role of secretary of the treasury

term.#tail: includes a Delegate or Resident Commissioner to the Congress.
